and cartonno = #{cartonNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select: SELECT tl.level as cartonNo FROM tmp_level tl LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM doc_order_packing_carton_info WHERE orderno = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AS info ON tl.level = info.cartonno WHERE info.cartonno IS NULL ORDER BY tl.level ASC LIMIT 1

select c.orderNo, c.orderCode, c.boxQty, d.traceid as traceId from ( select a.orderno as orderNo, a.soreference1 as orderCode, count(*) as boxQty from Doc_Order_Header a, Doc_Order_Packing_Carton_Info b where a.orderno = b.orderno and a.orderno = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by a.orderno, a.soreference1) c, Doc_Order_Packing_Carton_Info d where c.orderno = d.orderno order by d.traceid

select a.sku, b.descr_c as skuName from (select distinct customerid, sku from Act_Allocation_Details where orderno = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) a, Bas_Sku b where a.customerid = b.customerid and a.sku = b.sku and (b.sku = #{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or b.alternate_sku1 = #{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or b.alternate_sku2 = #{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or b.alternate_sku3 = #{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select orderno as orderNo, cartonno as cartonNo from Doc_Order_Packing_Carton_Info where orderno = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and packingflag is null

select a.orderno as orderNo, a.cartonno as cartonNo, sum(a.qty * IFNULL(c.grossweight, 0)) as grossWeight, sum(a.qty * IFNULL(c.cube, 0)) as cube from Doc_Order_Packing_Carton a, Doc_Order_Header b, Bas_Sku c where a.orderno = b.orderno and b.customerid = c.customerid and a.sku = c.sku and a.orderno = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.traceid = #{cartonNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by a.orderno, a.cartonno

select sub_tb.batchNum, sub_tb.serialNum, sub_tb.sku, sub_tb.differentQty from ( SELECT tmpA.batchNum as batchNum, tmpA.serialNum as serialNum, tmpA.sku, (IFNULL(tmpB.boxQty,0) - IFNULL(tmpA.allocationQty,0)) as differentQty FROM ( SELECT b.lotatt04 as batchNum, b.lotatt05 as serialNum, b.sku, SUM(a.qty) AS allocationQty FROM act_allocation_details a LEFT JOIN inv_lot_att b ON a.lotnum = b.lotnum WHERE a.orderno = #{orderNo} GROUP BY b.lotatt04, b.lotatt05, b.sku ) AS tmpA LEFT JOIN ( SELECT lotatt04, lotatt05, SUM(qty) AS boxQty FROM doc_order_packing_carton WHERE orderno = #{orderNo} GROUP BY lotatt04, lotatt05 ) AS tmpB ON IFNULL(tmpB.lotatt04,'') = IFNULL(tmpA.batchNum,'') AND IFNULL(tmpB.lotatt05,'') = IFNULL(tmpA.serialNum,'') WHERE (IFNULL(tmpB.boxQty, 0) - IFNULL(tmpA.allocationQty, 0)) <> 0 ) as sub_tb where sub_tb.batchNum IS NOT NULL OR sub_tb.serialNum IS NOT NULL
select ifnull(sum(qty), 0) from doc_order_packing_carton where orderno = #{orderno} and allocationdetailsid = #{allocationdetailsid}
